abstract: Yahoo Chief Executive Carol A. Bartz looked back with hindsight, and some humor, at the rejected takeover offer from Microsoft and also talked about this summer’s search deal in an interview on CNBC.
snippet: Yahoo Chief Executive Carol A. Bartz looked back with hindsight, and some humor, at the rejected takeover offer from Microsoft and also talked about this summer’s search deal in an interview on CNBC.

headline.main: Yahoo Chief Looks Back With Humor
